column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Isaak yɛɛ akɔdaa
column3: na n’enyi do yɛɛ no kusukusu
column5: ɔsomaa frɛɛ ne ba panyin Esau
column7: Me ba: na ɔgyee no do dɛ

w’egyen kotoku nye w’egyen
column6: na kɔ hamu kɛfa hanam brɛ me;"

column2: "na yɛ me edziban a ɔyɛ huam
column5: ma mindzi; na me kra nhyira wo ana mewu."

column2: "Na aber a Isaak rekasa kyerɛ ne ba Esau no
column3: Rebeka tsee. Na Esau kɔr hamu dɛ orukoku abowa

column2: "Rebeka kaa kyerɛɛ ne ba Jakob dɛ
column4: metsee dɛ w’egya reka kyerɛ wo nua Esau dɛ
column7: na yɛ me edziban a ɔyɛ huam
column9: na minhyira wo wɔ EWURADZE enyim ansaana mewu."

column4: tsie me ndze dɛ mbrɛ merehyɛ wo yi ara."

column3: na kɛkyer mpɔnkyemba a woye ebien wɔ hɔ brɛ me: na medze bɛyɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam ama w’egya

column2: "Na Jakob see ne na Rebeka dɛ
column4: mo nua Esau no ho wɔ nhwi
column5: na emi mo ho yɛ monomonom."

column2: "Bi a m’egya bɛkeka mo ho ahwɛ
column3: na mebɛyɛ n’enyi do dɛ ɔdaadaafo; na medze mpaa mebɛba mo do

column4: me ba: ɔwo tsie me ndze ara
column5: na kɔ kɛfa hɔn brɛ me."

column3: na ɔdze brɛɛ ne na: na ne na ɔdze yɛɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam

column2: "Na Rebeka faa ne ba panyin Esau ne ntar fɛɛfɛw a ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ fie no bi na ɔdze hyɛɛ ne ba kuma Jakob:"
"na ɔdze mpɔnkyemba no hɔn nwoma duraduraa ne nsa ho nye no kɔn monomonom no ho:"
"na ɔdze edziban a ɔyɛ huam no nye boodoo a woesiesie no dze hyɛɛ ne ba Jakob nsa."

column5: Emi nye yi. Woana nye wo

column3: Emi nye w’abakan Esau; mayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ekyerɛɛ me no: soɛr meserɛ wo
column4: tsena hɔ na dzi me hanam yi bi
column5: ama wo kra eehyira me."

column2: "Na Isaak bisaa ne ba no dɛ
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ma wo nsa kaa no ntsɛm dɛm
column5: Osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn maa mihyiaa yie."
ma menkeka wo monhwɛ
column7: kyerɛ dɛ me ba Esau noara nye wo anaa."

column2: "Na Jakob piin n’egya Isaak nkyɛn; na ɔkekaa no ho hwɛe
column4: Ndze no yɛ Jakob ne ndze
column5: na nsa no na ɔyɛ Esau ne nsa."

column3: osiandɛ ne nsa ho wɔ nhwi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ no nua Esau ne nsa ho tse: nna ohyiraa no."

column3: Ana ɔwo nye me ba Esau ara? Na ɔsee dɛ

column4: ma mindzi me ba ne hanam yi bi

column6: ma odzii: na ɔdze nsa brɛɛ no

column5: me ba."

column2: "Na ɔtwee pinii feew n’ano: na Isaak ohuaa n’atar no huam
column5: Hwɛ
column6: me ba ho hua Tse dɛ haban a EWURADZE ehyira do no mu hua:"

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn mma wo sor bɔsu bi

column3: Na amanaman nkotow wo: Yɛ wo nuanom do wura
column4: Na wo na mba nkotow wo: Ndom nka hɔn a wɔdom wo nyinara
column5: Na nhyira nka hɔn a wohyira wo nyinara."

column4: na Jakob fii n’egya nkyɛn firii ara pɛ nna no nua Esau fi n’ahayɛ baa fie."

column2: "Na ɔno so yɛɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam

column5: na ondzi ne ba ne hanam yi bi

column5: w’abakan Esau a."
na ɔdze abrɛ me
column6: ma medzi ne nyinara bi ansaana ereba

column2: "Aber a Esau tsee n’egya ne nsɛm no
column3: osuu su kɛse a ɔyɛ wen
column5: Hyira mo so

column3: Wo nua dze ndaadaa aba abɛgye wo nhyira kɔ."
Ana ɔno wɔmmfrɛ no Jakob bi? Iyi ka ho a oedzi me emim mpɛn ebien: ɔagye me panyin; na
column5: afei ɔagye me nhyira. Na obisaa dɛ

column2: "Na Isaak buae na ɔsee Esau dɛ. Hwɛ mayɛ no wo wura
column3: na medze no nuanom nyinara mayɛ no nkowaa; na eburow nye nsa nna medze awowaw no: na ɔwo dze
column5: me ba?"

column3: Aso nhyira kor pɛ na ewɔ
column5: mo so bi
column6: ao m’egya. Na Esau maa ne ndze do na osui."

column2: "Na n’egya Isaak buae na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: mbrɛ asaase a seradze nnyi no na ɔbɛyɛ wo tsenabea
column5: Na mbrɛ ɔsor ɔbɔsu yɛ hɔ na;"

column3: na ebɔsom wo nua; Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ egye woho a
column4: ɔno ibeyi no kɔndua wɔ wo kɔn ho."

column2: "Na Esau taan Jakob wɔ nhyira a n’egya dze hyiraa no ntsi: na Esau see n’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Nda a wɔdze bosu m’egya no abɛn; afei muruboku mo nua Jakob."

column2: "Na ne ba panyin Esua ne nsɛm no wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Rebeka; na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ ne ba kuma Jakob
column5: wo nua Esau kyekye no werɛ wɔ wo ho dɛ oruboku wo."
guan kɔ mo nua Laban nkyɛn wɔ Haran;"

column3: kɛpem dɛ wo nua n’ebufuw befi no mu;"

column2: "na no werɛ befir dza edze ayɛ no no; na mobɔsoma ma wɔaabɛfa wo wɔ hɔ aba: bɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na mobɔhwer hom beenu nyina da kor?"
